title: 1dFlagMotion
description: Produces a list of time points with excessive motion relative to the previous time point.

input_motion_file.title: Motion Parameters File
input_motion_file.description: Input file with EXACTLY 6 columns: roll pitch yaw delta-SI delta-LR delta-AP (angles in degrees followed by translations in mm)

max_translation.title: Maximum Translation
max_translation.description: Maximum translation allowed in any direction (defaults to 1.5mm)

max_rotation.title: Maximum Rotation
max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation allowed in any direction (defaults to 1.25 degrees)
